entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
